description: T.90 Yew - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.91 Yew - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.92 Western Hemlock - Fell (Terminal Decline).T.93 Holly - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.94 Yew - 1-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.G.95 Yew x3 - 1-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.96 Black Locust - 2m Holistic crown reduction & 2-3m lateral reduction of lowest major limb to suitable growth points & deadwood.G.97 Lime x3 - Repollard to previous points.T.98 Horse Chestnut - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.99 Black Locust - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood & install Cobra Bracing.T.100 Black Locust - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.
decision_conditions: T.90 Yew - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.91 Yew - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.92 - Western Hemlock - Crown lift to 2m from ground level only.T.93 Holly - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.94 Yew - 1-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 2m from ground level.G.95 Yew x3 - 1-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points staying within the green & crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.96 Black Locust - 2m Holistic crown reduction & 2-3m lateral reduction of lowest major limb to suitable growth points & deadwood.G.97 Lime x3 - Repollard to previous points.T.98 Horse Chestnut - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.99 Black Locust - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood & install Cobra Bracing.T.100 Black Locust - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.
No evidence provided to demonstrate that T.92 is in decline and requiring removal and this is not clear from the photos provided either.
